title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Deep Learning-Based Image Segmentation for Dental CBCT Image Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Design and implement a Dense U-Net model capable of accurately segmenting anatomical structures in CBCT imaging
Acquire techniques for applying anatomical constraints to improve dental lesion detection performance by over 20%

In a two-week mid-term process, learners identify three limitations of AI models in a simulation environment reflecting clinical settings (e.g., virtual patient monitoring systems) and write one-page reports proposing specific technical/process improvements for each limitation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
